long_description: The boys' Novara Stowable bike jacket is so light, comfortable and quiet, he may forget he has it on. When he takes it off, it stows conveniently in its own pocket. Recycled ripstop polyester fabric is tough enough to endure the daily grind; fabric is breathable, water resistant and windproof to 50 mph. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. 2 rear zippered pockets tote cycling essentials and food; left pocket is slightly larger than right; jacket stuffs conveniently into its own rear pocket. Soft elastic binding at waist, cuffs and neck helps keep out wind and water. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. The Novara Stowable bike jacket has reflective detailing to increase visibility to motorists.
